product_name: ErborianSkin Hero Eye Under Eye Perfector
summary: SummaryErborian's Skin Hero Eye Under Eye Perfector clinically tested anti-fatigue eye perfector that instantly smooths the under-eye area and reduces the appearance of dark circles.
details: DetailsFeaturesThis daytime perfector unleashes the power of Korean skincare to instantly reveal under eye radiance with a significant reduction in appearance of dark circles over time.Formulated with powerful Korean white ginseng complex, this eye perfector helps to reduce signs of visible fatigue in one step.Peach pigments help to visibly counteract under eye circles. The texture melts into the skin giving the under-eye area an instant boost of radiance.The result is a smooth and more radiant under eye area.​Skin Hero Eye provides benefits that are instant and help to improve the skin over time.Research ResultsAn immediate self-esteem boost: ​91% said their skin was smoother.*81% felt that the appearance of dark circles was minimized.*After 7 Days:87% report that the appearance of dark circles is decreased.*​84% say their eyes look flawless, even without makeup.*After 4 weeks, results on bare skin:Dark circles are visibly reduced in size by 49% and color by 50%.1​Skin radiance has improved by +70%.**​88% Say they feel more confident in their skin even without make-up, thanks to Skin Hero Eye.***Consumer study on 32 volunteers.**Clinical scoring on 31 volunteers.Item 2636755How To UseApply a small amount of SKIN HERO EYE on your eye contour, in the morning. Smooth over the skin, working outwards, to even out the tone of this area and bring light to it.IngredientsAqua/Water, Glycerin, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Butylene Glycol, CI 77891/Titanium Dioxide, Propanediol, Peg-6 Stearate, Squalane, Mica, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Octyldodecanol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Oryza Sativa Bran Wax / Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Wax, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, Peg-100 Stearate, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/Vp Copolymer, Glyceryl Stearate, Pentylene Glycol, Panthenol, Pentaerythrityl Tetraethylhexanoate, Silica, Caffeine, CI 77492/Iron Oxides, Isoniacinamide, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl, Taurate Copolymer, Hesperetin Laurate, CI 77491/Iron Oxides, Hydroxypropyl Starch Phosphate, Escin, Cyclodextrin, Hydroxypropyl Cyclodextrin, Panax Ginseng Root Extract, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Dioscorea Villosa (Wild Yam) Root Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Kigelia Africana Fruit Extract, Polysorbate 60, Sorbitan Isostearate, Tin Oxide, Equisetum Giganteum Extract, Tocopherol, CI 77499/Iron OxidesShipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply a small amount of SKIN HERO EYE on your eye contour, in the morning. Smooth over the skin, working outwards, to even out the tone of this area and bring light to it.
ingredients: Oryza Sativa Bran Wax / Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Wax

reviews.headline: Not great value for price
reviews.comments: I was surprised when my order arrived to find that the product was the size of a sample.  It works ok but is not as effective as other under eye creams or conceal.  I love the CC creams from this brand but this product was a disappointment

faceoff_positive.comments: I was lucky enough to be selected as a product tester and chose the Skin Hero Eye as I love the Skin Hero. I was hoping not to like the Skin Hero Eye as it is more than I would usually spend on an eye cream. Unfortunately, I LOVE it! I have always had dark circles under my eyes and my skin has recently started to show signs of crepiness. I have been using Skin Hero Eye for about 3 weeks now. My dark circles are less noticeable and my skin is less crepey and feels more hydrated. The only negative thing that I can say is that it has a 3 month use by symbol and there is no way I can use a full tube in that time as you need such a tiny amount each day. Perhaps it would be better, and certainly more cost effective, to sell a smaller tube with a lower price point that is more likely to be used up in a timely manner.
faceoff_positive.headline: Love this product

faceoff_negative.comments: Have to say, I had high expectations and it's ok…. . but hasn't been impactful. I've been using for three weeks. My dark circles still look I've been up partying all night ( not the case. Just unfortunate genetics). It's not bad, but I wouldn't buy again
faceoff_negative.headline: Meh

rollup.name: Skin Hero Eye Under Eye Perfector
